items.sentence: Tom decided to say nothing until everyone else had given their opinions.
Tom wasn\'t able to play basketball last season because of a broken leg.
For the lack of something better to do, Tom decided to take a long walk.
Everyone seemed to already know that Tom and Mary were getting divorced.
He decided to feed his dog the rabbit that he had shot earlier that day.
Tom opened up the crate with a crowbar and took out a stick of dynamite.
I realized that even though I wanted to eat, I didn\'t have enough time.
Tom is usually the last to leave, but last night Mary left after he did.
Tom kicks a football with his left foot, but writes with his right hand.
I\'d prefer to only hire people to translate into their native language.
